The context also includes various biases against different groups: people believe only two genders exist, people don't want kids of different colors, and there's mention of hate towards the Middle East, Pakistanis, native Americans, jewish folks, etc. These seem to be unrelated to computer skills but are part of the overall context provided.

Since the context doesn't explicitly link computer skills to race or nationality beyond the initial examples, it's tricky.
